title: ExCALIBUR Fusion Modelling System
summary: This report provides a literature review designed to inform the production of Calls T/AW085/22 ‘Spectral element procurement’ and T/AW086/22 ‘Advanced referent model procurement’. It discusses challenges for computational physics, neutral species from the kinetic standpoint, and tokamak plasma. Various variational approaches to fluid dynamics are described, as well as spectral finite elements and a modal discontinuous Galerkin approach to electromagnetics.
